meanings.definition: A rail serving as a support or guard for the hand, as on a staircase or around a balcony.
meanings.sent1: Hold onto the handrail while going up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The handrail along the balcony kept everyone safe.
meanings.sent3: The handrail decided to take a break and let the stairs support themselves.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a comforting handrail guiding me through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The bright red handrail stood out against the white staircase, making it easy to see and grab.
